content: {A灵光一现}Let's celebrate <style=Highlight>tomorrow</style>, when your new home is complete! <style=SizeSmall>And maybe we can arrange for a Starsea Voyage as well, hoho~!</style>

content: <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.'s</style> construction crew will finish the building by <style=Highlight>tomorrow</style>. Their work won't result in any disruption.

content: Oh, my apologies. This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is full again. Take it and use it to water the Luca Arbor again.

content: {A惊叹}<style=SizeBig>Congratulations</style>, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! Now you have your very first house!
